General.Name: Movinn AS
General.Description: Movinn A/S provides move-in-ready and plug-and-play serviced apartments in Denmark and Sweden. The company offers co-living services, and rents furniture under the Collective Yoyo brand. It also provides furniture, electronics, equipment, linen, kitchen supplies, cleaning, insurances, maintenance, flexibility, etc., as well as laundry 24 hours assistance services. The company operates a portfolio of serviced apartments and co-living properties in Copenhagen, Aarhus, and Odense; and Malmö, and Lund. It serves companies, international organizations, insurance companies. residents, businesses, governments, and insurance sectors. Movinn A/S was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.
